mainText:
All he wanted to do was innovate. All he wanted to do was blow people 
away by showing them what humanity could accomplish. He never looked 
back. He was never ashamed. He constantly looked forward. All he wanted 
to do was to put a ding in the Universe. He did it. I'm only 16, but I 
can assure you that he would want us to continue to look forward. He'd 
want us to start building the next big thing tomorrow. Always, Tomorrow.
author: David
